resources.string: To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
Coptic Church Directory locates the nearest monastery, retreat center, and Coptic community.
Find the local church in your neighborhood by simply inputting your zip code or address in the search box
Coptic Church Directory displays important church information such as clergy contact details and church phone numbers
Coptic Church Directory locates the nearest church, monastery, retreat center, and Coptic community.

Content such as the description of the church history, church information, and serving clergy have been collected from the various diocese websites. These include the Diocese of Los Angeles, Southern California, and Hawaii, the Diocese of the Southern United States and the Diocese of New York and New England.
Nihovâ€™s Worldwide Coptic Directory was also used and played an instrumental role in finding many of the churches along with the description of the church and the serving priest(s)
